alert.note: Alert for Broome; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:25AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Broome, southeastern Tioga, northwestern Susquehanna and northeastern Bradford Counties through 600 AM EDT... At 525 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Apalachin to near Rome to near Burlington. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Binghamton, Vestal, Johnson City, Endicott, Maine, Rush, Towanda, Wysox, Port Dickinson and Orwell. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 3 and 7. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 65 and 72. Interstate 88 between 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
